title: Bubble Sort
subject: Algorithms
theory:
Repeatedly swap adjacent elements if they are in wrong order. The largest element 'bubbles' to the end in each pass. 
Pass 1 puts Max at end.
Pass 2 puts 2nd Max at n-1.

interview_questions.question: When is Bubble Sort O(n)?
interview_questions.answer: If array is already sorted AND we use a 'swapped' flag to exit early.
